mutants.code:
def binTreeSortedLevels(arr, n):
    li = []
    i = 1
    level = 0
    while i < n:
        dumm = []
        if level == 0:
            li.append([arr[i]])
            i += 1
            level += 1
        else:
            size = 2 ** level
            if i + size < n:
                dumm.extend(arr[i:i + size])
                dumm.sort()
                li.append(dumm)
                i += size
                level += 1
            else:
                dumm.extend(arr[i:])
                dumm.sort()
                li.append(dumm)
                break
    return li

        if level == 0:
            li.append([arr[i]])
            i += 1
            level += 1
        else:
            size = 2 ** level
            if i + size < n:
                dumm.extend(arr[i:i * size])
                dumm.sort()
                li.append(dumm)
                i += size
                level += 1
            else:
                dumm.extend(arr[i:])
                dumm.sort()
                li.append(dumm)
                break
    return li
